name: SimplAI
tagline: The simplest and fastest way to build and deploy Agentic AI
description: A single platform for building, deploying, and managing Agentic AI in any environment - on-prem, cloud, or hybrid. It provides robust governance, security, and scalability, so you can launch AI applications simpler and faster.

name: Stripo Email Design Platform
tagline: AI, teamwork, and a new era of email design
description: Stripo leveled up! Our brand-new editor introduces AI Hub, real-time co-editing, commenting, and more‚Äîgiving teams a seamless workflow for email creation. Whether you're a marketer, designer, or enterprise team, collaborate and create emails faster than ever!

name: Scene 2.0 - Modular AI Web Builder
tagline: The smart way to build websites
description: Scene is redefining the way modern websites are created‚Äîenabling designers and agency teams to ideate, build, and publish websites from a single canvas, with AI empowering their ideation process without limiting customization or creativity.

name: ActionKit
tagline: Instantly add 1000+ integration actions to your AI agent
description: With a single API call, ActionKit (by Paragon) equips your product's AI agents with 1000+ integration actions across CRMs, ticketing platforms, email, Slack, and more. Paragon is trusted by enterprise AI companies like AI21, You.com, and Copy.ai.

name: Kilo Code for VS Code
tagline: Lightning speed autonomous AI coding agent
description: Kilo AI is an AI-powered extension for VS Code which writes, fixes and improves your code through simple chat. Tuned with the fastest models we could find, it can create and modify files, run command line prompts, and much more.

name: Moio
tagline: The future app builder for designers
description: Moio is a design tool that allows designers to build functional product design, not just static images. Design and test real user flows, eliminate the gap between mockups and final products, and streamline your product development process.

name: Redactable
tagline: Protect your sensitive data in documents before sharing them
description: Redactable uses AI to find and permanently remove sensitive information from documents‚Äîunlike traditional methods that leave data vulnerable to bad actors. Save 98% of time while ensuring protection across legal, healthcare, and financial sectors.

name: Docko
tagline: Your virtual pet in your macOS dock
description: Your virtual pet in your macOS Dock

name: Atono
tagline: Plan, build, run, and improve your product in one place
description: Atono is an all-in-one platform for agile, cross-functional teams building web apps. Get essential features like roadmapping, story writing, feature flagging, bug reporting, and usage tracking to plan, build, run, and improve your product ‚Äì all in one place.

name: EmemeAI
tagline: Create & Export AI characters to apps and games
description: Bring your AI character to life‚ô° Without code, You can create 3D chat AI characters, and connect them to external apps, social media, metaverse and games to use as AI-NPCs. They generate not only chat, but also voices and animations. It's free.

name: Grok for Android
tagline: The official app by xAl
description: Grok is an Al-powered assistant, developed by xAl, designed to be maximally truthful, useful, and curious. Get answers to any question, generate striking images, and upload pictures to gain a deeper understanding of your world.

name: Qwen2.5-Omni
tagline: The end-to-end model powering multimodal chat
description: Qwen2.5-Omni is an end-to-end multimodal model by Qwen team at Alibaba Cloud, Understands text, images, audio & video; generates text & natural streaming speech.

name: R2R
tagline: Deep Research Agents for Your Data, via API
description: R2R: The first open source agentic retrieval system available via API that autonomously researches your documents, searches and scrapes the web, builds knowledge graphs, and delivers comprehensive, citation-backed answers through simple RESTful endpoints.

name: Kanban Kanban
tagline: Kanbans within Kanbans, it‚Äôs Kanbanception!
description: Kanbans within Kanbans, it‚Äôs Kanbanception! A recursive Kanban system ‚Äî think Russian dolls, where every card in a board opens into another board automatically. Currently just validating the idea - would you be interested in something like this?

name: Mini Cozy Room : Lo-Fi
tagline: Mini cozy room
description: Decorate your own cozy workspace! „ÄéMini Cozy Room : Lo-Fi„Äè combines relaxing Lo-Fi music and room decoration into one productivity game. Cute avatars and pets will keep you company, while desktop Pomodoro timers, notes, and to-do lists boost your efficiency.

name: YT Speed Controller
tagline: Control YouTube video playback speed with custom buttons
description: YT Speed Controller enhances YouTube with customizable playback speed controls. Easily adjust speeds with one click, create keyboard shortcuts, and choose where controls appear. Save time and improve your viewing experience with precise speed management.

name: EasyListing
tagline: Create, manage, and grow your email list
description: üöÄ Effortless Subscriber Management API ‚Äì Collect and store unlimited email subscribers with ease! Our simple REST API helps developers and businesses seamlessly manage email lists without extra costs. No complex setups, no limits‚Äîjust a powerful solution.

name: Scroll it to me
tagline: Instantly create a screen of scrolling text
description: Type some text. Make it scroll. Flash that screen. Let it show! In a world of digital messaging. Be that Analog (ish).

name: Soar - The New Atlas
tagline: Direct access to all the world's maps and satellite images
description: Soar is an Aussie startup building the world's new atlas using crowd and organisation sourced maps. This groundbreaking endeavor marks a pivotal moment in the mapping industry, reminiscent of the transformative impact Google Earth had in 2005.

name: Good Game Insights
tagline: Free CSV Datasets of scraped data from Steam
description: Good Game Insights (gginsights.io) - Your AI-powered platform to explore the Steam marketplace, uncover video game sales trends, and learn about the current video games industry. Gain actionable insights, track market dynamics, and level up!

tagline: The simplest and fastest way to build and deploy Agentic AI
